CustomField.description: To be used to preview the PDF version of the current Invoice record
CustomField.formula: IF(ISBLANK(tc9_et__View_Invoice_PDF__c),"Create Invoice PDF to View", HYPERLINK( tc9_et__View_Invoice_PDF__c , IMAGE(LEFT($Api.Partner_Server_URL_260, FIND( '/services', $Api.Partner_Server_URL_260))+ "resource/tc9_et__t2pJ_Images/t2pJ_Images/View_Blue.png","Invoice PDF"),"_self"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To be used to preview the PDF version of the current Invoice record
CustomField.label: Invoice PDF
